channel.title: New server i need all the good coders to come together
channel.description:
ok heres the deal alot of good coders are working on there own separate server but the way i see it we could catch up to thew real rs faster if we worked together on 1 server but this is what we need
1. a source(i would like to use chezscape source because thats the one i use [ty xero]) 2. 4-10 good coders(i'll code too) 3. 1 person to add the codes to the source(must be able to correct any errors it gets) 4.3-5 testers
--coders-- 1.Meh 2.Morsolo 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. --testers-- 1.the lazy 2.morsolo(coder 2 :)) 3.evil_ 4.taylor 5. 6. 7.
so if you wanna help post here or pm me.

item.title: New server i need all the good coders to come together
item.dc:creator: @Adm1n_Kieron Adm1n Kieron
item.description:
@Adm1n_Kieron wrote:

i will be a tester. c’mon people. work together once we have this perfect source, private server’s will be ace! just work as a team get a perfect source. as the real rs is at it’s current state. i can provide domain name. with dedicated server. if anyone know how to geta rs server online like they have. good web designer design good site. forusm etc. get the game on. a few worlds call it sumink dif. nd that charge Â£5 for lifetime members, would nick half of jagex’s customer’s. because it’s cheaper for members. lotsa f2p nd new people would start our game instead, we could really make some money. and use it to develop the project even more. start off as free game to begin with maybe. i have a couple thousand to spend on the project. comeon people unite! when we have the perfect server i will like isue wages via paypal,

Read full topic

item.title: New server i need all the good coders to come together
item.dc:creator: @morsolo morsolo
item.description:
@morsolo wrote:

Hmmm, I doubt all the really good coders will come together, cause most of them want to get their own credit for their own work…

As for the source…If all the good coders come together, they should make their own source…
Like DiD (Silentone), Avatar (Phate), WhiteScape (WhiteFang), CheezScape (Xerocheez), Project16 (I forget, soz person )
We could call it DivtarScape16 - lol

I would be up for coding, I’m not as good as Phate, Xero, WhiteFang, etc. But I can code…
I would also be up for testing…

Read full topic
